title: Who would you rather have a drink with?
body:
Been thinking recently, which League Of Legends champ would I like to share a drink with?

Here's the first few to come to mind:

{{champion:201}} Braum: A nice, friendly bloke who would surely provide some good conversation.

{{champion:79}} Gragas: Obvious reasons.

{{champion:223}} Tahm Kench: Dunno why, but i just love the guy.

Feel free to post your thoughts and who **you** would like to have a drink with.

replies.body: who needs alcohol when you have shrooms {{champion:17}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:17}}
{{champion:24}} I wanna see if he has a mouth

I don't really drink but,

{{champion:35}} : i'd probably die but it would certainly be an interesting experience having a drink with the demon jester

{{champion:268}} : a chance to pledge allegiance and my service towards the emperor of shurima and to apologise for all the times I fed the enemy because I am horrible at this champion.

{{champion:45}}  : i feel, that the most diabolical and bitter yordle to ever live in runterra would be quite the character to have a chat with

{{champion:92}} : as much as I generally don't like some of the players who play this champ, she's probably best girl lore wise

{{champion:31}} : i'd really like to ask what the void is like and apparently cho'gath is quite the conversationalist when he isn't devouring people

{{champion:102}} : I imagine her being a rather.... affectionate drunk. Though you will probably get horribly burned by that affection.

{{champion:74}} : /dance

{{champion:53}} : "I have corrupted my social algorithms with a reverse logic virus, our interactions should reach the extent of possible mortal hilarity"

{{champion:134}} : Juggling, that's all.

> [{quoted}](name=Gloric,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=iUOEXzam,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-01-08T12:25:23.260+0000)
>
> {{champion:102}} : I imagine her being a rather.... affectionate drunk. Though you will probably get horribly burned by that affection.

I think she'll burn up J4 after you as well.

{{champion:136}} Aurelion Sol: Imagine the stories this man could tell....

{{champion:157}} Yasuo: As much trouble as he is in game, he's a pretty chill and cool guy. 

Also... any number of the unnaturally pretty female champs work too.. xD

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=iUOEXzam,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-01-08T11:54:20.782+0000)
>
> Also... any number of the unnaturally pretty female champs work too.. xD

In terms of personality, most of the girls (pretty or otherwise) in Leagues imo don't make good drinking buddies, a lot of them are either too serious, too cold or flat out nuts.

But Nami and Lux are cool, I'll drink with them.

{{champion:157}} Yasuo: He seems like a good drinking buddy, who drinks well and doesn't make a mess out of it. As long as no one brings up anything about the Ionian war, this guy is pretty perfect to drink with.

{{champion:37}} Sona: Ask her to play music after feeding her with enough alcohol, and no, I do mean it literally and am not making a sex joke in this one.

{{champion:163}} Taliyah: For similar reason as Yasuo, seems just like a cool drinking buddy all around.

{{champion:33}} Rammus: Whenever I wanna cry my eyes out in a drinking session, I will get this guy as my drinking buddy, because he's okay with anything including me wasting hours of his time for my whining.

There are more, but I'll stop for now.

As awesome as she is... I dont think {{champion:163}} is old enough to drink.

She is just 16.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=iUOEXzam,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-01-08T11:55:27.557+0000)
>
> As awesome as she is... I dont think {{champion:163}} is old enough to drink.
> 
> She is just 16.

I believe that she is far more moderate and self-conscious than many other underage alcohol drones we have around here so I guess that's technically fine, though probably not legally in terms of modern laws lol.

That being said, if we also consider Runeterra's seemingly fantasy and somewhat medieval setting, it's probably okay for people to already be drinking at 16 years old in terms of their standards. So yeah.

But hey, let's just pretend she's legal to drink.
